meta_description.text: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask is an action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 64 home console.Director(s): Eiji Aonuma; ‎Yoshiaki Koizumi‎Writer(s): Mitsuhiro Takano; Shigeru Miyamoto‎; ...‎Artist(s): Yusuke Nakano; ‎Takaya Imamura‎Genre(s): Action-adventure‎Gameplay · ‎Plot · ‎Development · ‎Reception
